details: Can be stacked up to 3 times, once for each unique Explorer Warrior to reach Master Level

info: To create one, choose the 'Explorers' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until you reach the quest 'Victoria Island or Bust' and choose the 'Warrior, powerful and defensive' option

Once you reach Lv. 30 as a Warrior, talk to Dances with Balrog to accept a quest called 'Way of the Spearman'. Completing the quest will make you a Spearman and you will be on the path to a Dark Knight. Spearman is the 2nd job of Dark Knight

details: Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path
4th Job skills require Mastery Books to reach Master Level

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Gungnir's Descent - Boss Rush and Reinforce
  • Evil Eye - Hex Reinforce and Reinforce
  • Final Pact - Damage

primary.name: Maple Return
primary.shortDesc: Returns you to Southperry Harbor on Maple Island.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.desc: Slashes forward
Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice

primary.desc: Dive downwards towards nearby platforms below
details: Can only be used while in the air
Can also be activated by pressing the Down Arrow Key and Attack Key together
For both, you can also press the Left or Right Arrow Key instead to dive towards the desired direction

primary.desc: Launches your spear forward
details: The attack has increased %Crit Chance if enemies are hit by the shaft of the spear
The attack has increased %Damage if enemies are hit by the spear blade

primary.desc: Summons an Evil Eye that regularly heals you
Sweep your spear to pull in enemies while stunning them
Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)
Grants your attacks a chance to deal an additional hit
Twirl your spear, damaging enemies caught in it
details: At the end of the skill, you perform a final strike

primary.desc: Dashes forward while pushing back enemies
Unleashes a shockwave that stuns and damages nearby enemies
Launch up into the air
details:

  • Right-clicking the skill will lock it, preventing input activation

primary.desc: Increases %Final Damage based on your current %HP
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Final Damage
Additionally while active, increases %Damage Reduction based on your missing HP

primary.desc: will now periodically attack nearby enemies
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.desc: will periodically buff you and party members granting flat Attack and DEF and %Crit Rate

primary.desc: A giant spear strikes down on one enemy
details: Attack has increased %Ignore DEF
Cooldown is ignored if or buff is active

primary.desc: Removes buffs on nearby enemies and prevents them from casting new buffs
Swings your spear forward rapidly multiple times

details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Ignore DEF
Additionally, while buff is active, can be used without a cooldown
Successful attacks from will reduce the cooldown slightly

primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds
When your HP reaches 0, fully restores HP and MP while granting a buff
details:
[Buff]: You are invincible and can be casted without a cooldown
  • While this buff is active, you must defeat 30 enemies or hit a boss 30 times to reduce the cooldown of the skill
  • Your attacks ignore Attack Ignore and Damage Reflect
[Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage, %Crit Rate, %Crit Damage and grants flat Movement Speed when your %Max HP is above a certain threshold
Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now grants flat Attack and increases %Crit Damage

primary.desc: When hit, launches a counterattack that will restore some %Max HP
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage of

hyperActive.desc: Unleashes an explosion around you that damages nearby enemies

fifthMain.name: Spear of Darkness
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 350, summoned spear deals 600% damage 7 times on up to 12 enemies.\nAdditional Critical Rate: +100%, Additional Monster DEF Ignored: +50%.\nCooldown: 10 sec
details: You can direct the spear using the Up and Down Arrow Keys
The attack has increased Ignore DEF and is a guaranteed Critical Hit

fifthMain.name: Radiant Evil
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, Evil Eye appears in front of you, attacking up to 10 enemies 2 times, dealing 375% damage for 3 sec.\nCooldown: 20 sec
fifthMain.desc: transforms into a giant version that pulsates, damaging nearby enemies
details: Only usable while is active

fifthMain.name: Calamitous Cyclone
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100. Deals 800% damage 12 times consecutively on up to 12 enemies for up to 9 sec. Recover 1% of max HP for every attack that lands.\nWhen key is released, activates a shockwave 5 times that deals 15 final attack(s) with 600% damage to a max of 12 enemies. Recover 10% of max HP for every final attack that lands. All Piercing Cyclone hits receive Additional Critical Rate: +100%, and Addition Monster Def Ignored: +50%\nCooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: Unleashes a flurry of quick strikes in front of you
details: At the end of the attack, launch forward a final spear that deals heavy damage
The attack has increased %Ignore DEF and is a guaranteed Critical Hit

fifthMain.name: Darkness Aura
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000. Periodically attack up to 6 enemies with 800% damage for 40 sec, then recover 6% of max HP and obtain 1 Life Force. If HP recovery exceeds Max HP, creates a shield that amounts to 75% of the recovery amount. Max Life Force: 15, Max Shield: 27% of Max HP
With Hyper Body Applied: Periodically creates a maximum-strength shield.
With Iron Will Applied: Damage: -9% (only for attacks that inflict damage at a certain ratio of your Max HP while attacking).
Reusing this skill during its effect will deactivate that effect, but will also cause a Life Force Explosion that attacks 8 enemies with 1275% damage 13 times, as well as 1 more Life Force Explosions every 3 secs.
Cooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: Creates a damaging aura that amplifies the effects of and
details:
Each attack from Darkness Aura will recover some %Max HP and grant 1 Life Force (up to 15)
  • If your HP is full, instead you will gain a damage shield based on the amount that was supposed to be recovered
At the end of the skill or when the skill is pressed again, based on how much Life Force was accumulated, you will create multiple explosions
[ Special Effect]: Grants a damage shield
[ Special Effect]: Increases %Damage Reduction against %Max HP attacks

meta: Dark Knight is a STR warrior class part of the Explorers. Dark Knight has a very solid and simple kit and playstyle. There is also enough variety that makes Dark Knights an interesting enough class
